{{< fa address-card size=large >}} I am the LeRoy Neiman Term Chair Professor of Sociology at the University of California, Los Angeles, former co-editor of *American Sociological Review*, current member of the Sociological Research Association and the Board of Reviewing Editors of the journal *Science*. 
</p>

<p align="justify"> 
{{< fa chart-line size=large >}} I study culture, cognition, networks, theory, consumption, institutions, and organization.
